abstract: Steve Mandanda (French pronunciation: ​[stɛv mɑ̃dɑ̃nda]; born 28 March 1985) is a French international footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for French club Marseille in Ligue 1, where he serves as first-choice captain. Mandanda played for Le Havre and is also a French international. He has represented France at three international tournaments; UEFA Euro 2008, 2010 FIFA World Cup and the UEFA Euro 2012.

name: Mandanda, Steve
